alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne; Rawlins (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 10:55PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Cheyenne and western Rawlins Counties in northwestern Kansas through 1115 PM CDT... At 1055 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles northwest of McDonald, or 15 miles south of Benkelman, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... McDonald around 1100 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Goodland.
